plus.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;700&display=swap'); :root { --glass-blur: blur(12px); --transition-bezier: cubic-bezier(0.2, 0.8, 0.2, 1); } [class*='appMount_'] { background: var(--bg-tertiary) !important; } [class*='sidebar_'] { background: rgba(60, 56, 54, 0.6) !important; backdrop-filter: var(--glass-blur); border-radius: 0 20px 0 0; border-right: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05); } [class*='chat_'] { background: transparent !important; } [class*='container_'][class*='themed_'] { background: transparent !important; } [class*='panels_'] { background: rgba(40, 40, 40, 0.8) !important; backdrop-filter: var(--glass-blur); border-top: 1px solid rgba(211, 134, 155, 0.2); } [class*='channelTextArea_'] { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2) !important; border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.05); transition: all 0.3s var(--transition-bezier); border-radius: 24px; } [class*='channelTextArea_']:focus-within { box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(211, 134, 155, 0.15); border-color: rgba(211, 134, 155, 0.5); transform: scale(1.01); } [class*='message_']:hover { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.03) !important; transform: translateX(6px); transition: transform 0.2s ease; border-left: 2px solid #d3869b; } [class*='member_'] { transition: all 0.2s var(--transition-bezier); margin-left: 8px; } [class*='member_']:hover { background: rgba(211, 134, 155, 0.1) !important; transform: translateX(-4px); border-radius: 8px; } [class*='button_'][class*='lookFilled_'] { transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.34, 1.56, 0.64, 1); } [class*='button_'][class*='lookFilled_']:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 8px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); } @keyframes slideUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } } [class*='chatContent_'] { animation: slideUp 0.6s var(--transition-bezier); }
